author: Special Correspondent
text:
Village Administrative Officers in Erode West and Modakurichi Assembly segments received training at the taluk office here on Tuesday on carrying out rectifications in the electoral rolls.

They were apprised about their responsibility for preparing error free photo electoral rolls, and the actions to be taken for inclusion, deletion, correction, and transposition of entries.

The VAOs were asked to insist on filling up of Form 6 for inclusion of voters along with submission of proof of residence, proof of age for those between 18 to 20 years, and the particulars about shift in the residence after receipt of EPIC. For deletion of names, the VAOs were instructed to ask for proof of shifting or death through filling of Form 7. Correction of particulars relating to an entry in the roll could be undertaken with sufficient proof using Form 8, and transposition of entries from one part to another part of the electoral roll within the same assembly constituency must be rectified in Form 8 A, with sufficient proof for shift in residence, the VAOs were told.
title: VAOs receive training for preparing error-free electoral rolls in Erode
